component.name: JJazzLab
component.summary: Generate backing tracks for any song

description.p: Fed up with boring backing tracks? Try JJazzLab and make your own dynamic backing tracks in just a few minutes!
"Love it, works as expected, wow, thanks to the author" - "Absolutely fantastic app!" (YouTube comments)

ul.li: Dynamic backing tracks - Create professional-quality backing tracks that breathe with real musicality.
Musically alive - Add variety, rhythmic accents and natural dynamics that keep your practice sessions inspiring.
Hundreds of styles at your fingertips - Master jazz standards with the signature jjSwing style, or explore any genre using compatible Yamaha style files for endless possibilities.
Simple user interface - Type in a few chord symbols, choose a style and hit play. No complex setup required.
Grows with your skills - Whether you're working on a simple blues or a complex composition with multiple sections and tempo changes, JJazzLab adapts to your needs.
Open-source platform for musicians and developers - JJazzLab welcomes community contributions, custom plugins, and new music generation features that keep evolving.
